import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image'; import styles from '../styles.module.scss'; const AccountInfo = ({ account, socket }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [data, setData] = useState({ race_played: 0, winrate: 0, race_won: 0, nfts: 0, stable_level: 0, estar: 0, tournament_played: 0, tournament_won: 0 }); useEffect(() => { if(socket == null ) return; socket.emit('load-account', account.address); }, [socket]) useEffect(() => { if(socket == null) return; socket.on('get-account', data => setData(data.accountStatistics)); }, [socket]); return (

); } export default AccountInfo;
